name: Descent - Silence of Mind
description: Hypnosis, memories, delusions and a disturbing secret revolve around silence of mind.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
